summary: Skeletons had no killmove set, so now they do
descriptionHtml:
Skyrim didn't have killmoves for skeletons, boo!
Some lore-friendly Draugr killmoves are now shared with skeletons; now enjoy smashing them to pieces!
Version available that is compatible with [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/37622/]Fight Like A Badass - Unarmed Killmoves Unlocked[/url] if you want to use your fists to smash these guys, just make sure it is loaded AFTER Fight like a Badass mod.
Compatible with Killmove mods such as The Dance of Death, just make sure this one is BELOW any of them on the load order.

Installation:
Extract into the Skyrim/Data folder and make sure it is checked on the load order; that's it!

Compatibility:
Incompatible with DUEL - Combat Realism (at this time)

Also available on the Steam Workshop:
[url=http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=155626925]Standard[/url]
[url=http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=155627618]BADASS EDITION[/url]

There are likely still some animations that don't look right with skeletons and I'll remove them in the future, I haven't had a chance to test all weapon types.

Credits:
Rusty shield in screenshot from [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/28146/?]Rusty Iron Shield for draugrs by FuriousFighter[/url].

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/3381541/?tb=mods&pUp=1]Check out my other mods![/url]
author: mrjentipede

files.name: Skeleton killmoves Standard
files.changelogHtml:
removed a couple animations that didn't look right
cleaned up file for better compatibility with Fight Like A Badass
